events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking shows no updates.
The issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay due to the customer's report of a late shipment.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the delayed delivery issue reported.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with the delay on your order.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have so I can investigate this further?
Sure, my order number is 4537-8921, and the last tracking update was from five days ago with no movement.
Thank you for the details. I've contacted the shipping carrier and expedited the investigation. We will update you within 24 hours.
Thanks for the quick response and for looking into this so promptly. I appreciate your help.
Since the shipment status remains unchanged, I have escalated this case to our logistics supervisor for immediate action.
The delivery issue has been resolved and your package is out for delivery today. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your order and everything is in good condition.
Yes, I got the package today, and everything looks perfect. Thanks for your support throughout.
We are glad your order arrived safely and the issue was resolved. Closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
